newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Colombo stocks end low, profit-taking pares gains.
newsitem.headline: Colombo stocks end low, profit-taking pares gains.

text.p: Sri Lanka stocks closed lower on Tuesday after early session gains were wiped out in late profit-taking by small investors, brokers said.
The all share index closed 1.08 points down at 606.68. John Keells Holdings fell five rupees to 180, Lanka Orix Leasing shed one rupee to 121.

"There is buying interest among local institutions and high net-worth clients," said Shanil Perera of Lanka Securities. "But they have withdrawn temporarily since the market is showing signs of softening due to profit-taking."
